channel.title: Need some help with Client background
channel.description: Well i got this client and the background or whatever is RUNE(sword)SCAPE and id like to get rid of that. Also i would like the change the background so its not a mirror, and the titlebox how would i change that. If you could tell me how to fix all three problems that would be awesome thank you. -Death

item.title: Need some help with Client background
item.dc:creator: @hippo429 hippo429
item.description:
@hippo429 wrote:

Wrong section… but in the client there should be a picture file (background pic) just edit that with paint shop pro or paint. for the rest… you need a cache editor

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help with Client background
